title: Comparison of Nordic walking and Conventional Aerobic training on Ambulatory endurance, Quality of life and Psychological status in Post Covid-19 patients: A Research protocol
procedures:
1. Recruit patients(N=70), Screen the patients for inclusion and exclusion criteria, Obtain informed consent

2. Perform baseline assessment

3. Allocation: Group A (35 patients), Group B (35 patients)

4. Group A : 4 weeks of aerobic training, 3 times a week

5. Group B : 4 weeks of Nordic walking, 3 times a week

6. Perform post-training assessment

7. Statistical analysis
